name: biblical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in, from, or relating to the Bible: They named their son Isaac after the biblical figure. He quotes Shakespeare as well as Biblical passages. Many of the allusions in the film are biblical.
like a story from the Bible, especially because of being very exciting, shocking, or extreme: After rain of biblical proportions, the match was cancelled. There were so many insects, it was almost biblical.
More examplesFewer examplesThey might be using biblical verses to justify their violence.They claim there is biblical support for capital punishment.In his view, this is not Biblical and therefore it is heresy.The rain gushed down with Biblical vengeance, turning the field into a swamp.
